message.body: Hey homie how you been? I don't know if I sent this link to some of my bands demos but here it is http://www.reverbnation.com/theimmortalssurfpunkband we
are playing way up in Ventura on the 8th but are working on playing shows in LA soon enough.
hell, yeah! can't wait to see you rock it live!
Thanks bro, we played 6 shows so far people always ask for more ha ha. I think well have some stickers ready by our next show too.
Thanks again. What places are there to play for bands where you live?

i'm about 30mins from hollywood...
i'll look around and get you a list. but...
weber's, cobalt cafe...
Ok cool I'll get on those we gotta start playing LA let me know what else you find.
